POST: http://localhost:3000/api/v1/user/verify_reset_link
body: email
response error:
{
    "success": false,
    "error": true,
    "message": "Token has been expired!"
}

response success
{
    "success": true,
    data:{email:'hansa.technofy@gmail.com'},
    "error": false,
    "message": "Token is valid!"
}
